apierrmsg_device_list_error.message: Unable to find a USB drive or SD card.

apierrmsg_device_list_error_on_hub.message: Unable to find a USB drive.

apierrmsg_device_list_error_workspace_ha.message: Unable to find a USB drive.

apierrmsg_operation_already_in_progress.message: An operation is already in progress.

app_description.message: Create recovery media for your Chromebook.

app_description_on_hub.message: Create a recovery USB drive for your OnHub.

app_description_workspace_hardware.message: Create a recovery USB drive for your Meet compute system.

chrome_app_deprecation_message.message: As announced publicly on the Chromium blog, Google is dropping support for Chrome Apps in June 2021. Please use the Chromebook Recovery Utility extension and related documentation to recover your device(s).

chrome_app_deprecation_message_on_hub.message: As announced publicly on the Chromium blog, Google is dropping support for Chrome Apps in June 2021. Please use the OnHub Recovery Utility extension and related documentation to recover your device(s).

complete_bullet1.message: To recover your Chromebook, plug the recovery media into your Chromebook.

complete_bullet1_on_hub.message: Unplug the power cable from your OnHub and insert the USB drive into the back of the device. Hold down the reset button and plug in power. Continue to hold the reset button for about 15 seconds or until the activity light on the USB drive starts to blink.

complete_bullet1_workspace_hardware.message: To recover your Meet compute system, follow the instructions in Recover your Google Meet hardware compute box, step 3: enter recovery mode

complete_bullet2.message: After recovery, you can erase your recovery media using this utility.

complete_bullet2_on_hub.message: Your OnHub will go through the recovery process, which can take several minutes. Once your OnHub has been recovered, it will reboot. Then use the Google On app to set up your OnHub.

complete_bullet2_workspace_hardware.message: To erase the USB flash drive when finished, start the Meet compute system recovery utility, click Settings and then click Erase recovery media

complete_message.message: You can remove your recovery media now.

complete_message_on_hub.message: You can remove your recovery USB drive now.

complete_message_workspace_hardware.message: You can remove the flash drive now

complete_title.message: Success! Your recovery media is ready

complete_title_on_hub.message: Success! Your recovery USB drive is ready

complete_title_workspace_hardware.message: Success! Your recovery USB drive is ready

confirm_cancelled_message_html.message:
Cancelled. Click on ”Create now” to try again.

To erase your recovery media, click on the gear icon in the top-right corner.

confirm_cancelled_message_html_on_hub.message:
Cancelled. Click on ”Create now” to try again.

To erase your recovery USB drive, click on the gear icon in the top-right corner.

confirm_cancelled_message_html_workspace.message:
Cancelled. Click on ”Create now” to try again.

To erase your recovery USB drive, click on the gear icon in the top-right corner.

confirm_message_html.message: Important: All data and partitions on your recovery media will be deleted.

confirm_message_html_on_hub.message: Important: All data and partitions on your recovery USB drive will be deleted.

confirm_message_html_workspace_hardware.message: Important: Everything on your flash drive will be deleted

dev_app_description.message: Development version of the Chromebook Recovery Utility.

dev_app_description_on_hub.message: Development version of the OnHub Recovery Utility.

dev_app_description_workspace_hardware.message: Development version of the Meet compute system Recovery Utility.

dev_app_name_workspace_hardware.message: Meet compute system Recovery Utility Dev

erase_complete_bullet1.message: Your USB drive or SD card is prepared for formatting.

erase_complete_bullet1_on_hub.message: Your USB drive is prepared for formatting.

erase_complete_bullet1_workspace_hardwar.message: Your USB drive is prepared for formatting.

erase_complete_bullet2.message: Format using a formatting tool provided by your operating system.

erase_complete_title.message: Your recovery media has been erased.

erase_complete_title_on_hub.message: Your recovery USB drive has been erased.

erase_complete_title_workspace_hardware.message: Your recovery USB drive has been erased.

erase_confirm_message.message: The recovery image and all partitions on your recovery media will be erased.

erase_confirm_message_on_hub.message: The recovery image and all partitions on your recovery USB drive will be erased.

erase_confirm_message_workspace_hardware.message: The recovery image and all partitions on your recovery USB drive will be erased.

erase_progress_text_on_hub.message: Don’t remove your recovery USB drive.

erase_progress_text_workspace_hardware.message: Don’t remove your recovery USB drive.

erase_select_target_no_devices_found.message: No USB drives or SD cards found

erase_select_target_select_device.message: Select the recovery media that you'd like to erase.

erase_select_target_select_device_on_hub.message: Select the recovery USB drive that you'd like to erase.

erase_select_target_select_device_worksp.message: Select the recovery USB drive that you'd like to erase.

errmsg_recovery_config_download_failure.message: Failed to download configuration file. Only offline features will be available.

hwid_invalid_model.message: Invalid model number. Please check your entry.

hwid_keep_typing.message: No model found yet. Keep typing.

hwid_match_found_and_checksum_verified.message: Found a match with the exact model name

select_image_select_from_list_link_text.message: Select a model from a list

select_image_text.message: Enter the model number of the Chromebook to recover. It can be found on the recovery screen.

select_image_text_workspace_hardware.message: Enter the model number of your Meet compute system

select_image_this_chromebooks_model_numb.message: For this Meet compute system, enter

Warning: Is this the correct USB drive?

select_target_low_capacity_error_on_hub.message: Your USB drive must be at least 8 GB.

select_target_low_capacity_error_workspa.message: Your USB drive must be at least 8 GB.

select_target_select_device.message: Select the media that you'd like to use.

select_target_select_device_on_hub.message: Select the USB drive that you'd like to use.

select_target_select_device_workspace_ha.message: Select the USB drive that you'd like to use.

select_target_title.message: Insert your USB flash drive or SD card

unsupported_text.message: Unfortunately, your platform is not supported at this time. Please refer to the Chromebook Help Centre for more information.

unsupported_text_mac.message: Unfortunately, Mac is only supported on M37 or higher. Please update your Chrome to M37. This may require a switch to Beta channel.

unsupported_text_on_hub.message: Unfortunately, your platform is not supported at this time. Please refer to the OnHub Help Centre for more information.

usupported_text_workspace_hardware.message: Unfortunately, your platform is not supported at this time. Please refer to the Google Meet hardware Help Centre for more information.

warning_offline.message: Device is offline. Only offline features will be available.

welcome_text.message: You'll need an 8 GB or larger USB flash drive or SD card that you don't mind erasing.

welcome_text_on_hub.message: You'll need an 8 GB or larger USB flash drive that you don't mind erasing.

welcome_text_workspace_hardware.message: You'll need an 8 GB or larger USB flash drive that you don't mind erasing. You can also use an SD card if your device has an SD slot.

welcome_title.message: Create a recovery media for your Chromebook

welcome_title_on_hub.message: Create a recovery USB drive for your OnHub

welcome_title_workspace_hardware.message: Create a recovery USB drive for your Meet compute system

write_message_on_hub.message: Don’t remove your recovery USB drive.

write_message_workspace_hardware.message: Don’t remove the USB flash drive.
